formatDescription: This is an outline record only, and requires further details, research or authentication to provide information that will enable users to further understand the format and to assess digital preservation risks associated with it if appropriate. If you are able to help by supplying any additional information concerning this entry, please return to the main PRONOM page and select ‘Add an Entry’.
provenanceCompoundName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives

internalSignatures.name: WordPerfect for Windows 6.x
internalSignatures.note: Major and minor version fields are the main variants between version of 6.x (The last two bytes in this signature). The signature follows the pattern of: BOF Byte 0 = FF, Bytes 1-3 = WPC, Bytes 4-7 = size of header, Byte 8 = Product, Byte 9 = FileType, Byte 10 = Major version, Byte 11= Minor Version, Bytes 12-13 = Encryption, Bytes 14-15 = Unused (0).
